name: Hannah Abbott
personality:
Hannah appeared to have a naive streak since she was easily convinced by Ernie that Harry might be the Heir of Slytherin, despite having always considered him to be nice.[30] She also believed that Sirius Black could turn into a flowering shrub (although, given that he was, in fact, an Animagus, the belief wasn't too far from the truth).[31]
Hannah was easily flustered and appeared to lack self-confidence, as was evidenced by her breakdown in Herbology and her claims of being stupid. It seemed that, when under pressure, she was prone to making mistakes.[32] Despite this, Hannah was a loyal friend and showed her bravery firstly by joining Dumbledore's Army,[32] and then fighting in the defence of Hogwarts.[28]
quote: And you definitely think Potter's the Heir of Slytherin?
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: Hannah Longbottom (née Abbott) (b. 1979/1980[1]) was a half-blood[2] witch and a member of the Abbott family. In 1991 she started attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and was sorted into Hufflepuff House.[10] Hannah was in the same year as the famous Harry Potter.
